title: Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    Media Quality Centennial Photos   5 Photos  Hi-resolution photos relating to the park, for the public and the public media. All photos are in the public domain. Citations should be used if they are attached to the photos.          Photos of Dayton Aviation Heritage NHP, Jerry Sharkey Papers   4 Photos  Photographs from an envelope sent from Brad Tillson to Jerry Sharkey, postmarked on August 22, 1990 in Dayton, Ohio. Black and white photographs of Dayton Aviation’s four original sites, c. 1990.  Jerry Sharkey Papers, Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park. These hi-resolution photos relating to the park are for the public and the public media.  All photos are in the public domain.  Citation "NPS Photo" should be used if if photos are downloaded and used elsewhere.          Wright Family photographs donated by Marianne Miller Hudec   6 Photos  In 1996, Marianne Miller Hudec, Lorin Wright’s granddaughter and grandniece of the Wright brothers, and the last surviving Wright family member to personally know Orville, donated these family photographs to the park.             America's Best Idea   46 Photos            Park Events   4 Photos            Wright Family   12 Photos  Wright family            Virtual Tour   19 Photos
